question: The Agriculture trading portal e-NAM (National Agriculture Market) was launched on April 14, in which year?
explanation:
The electronic portal for Agricultural trading, e-NAM (National Agriculture Market) was launched on April 14, 2016.
This flagship initiative was seen in news as it has completed four years of implementation. The portal was launched with an aim to connect the existing APMC mandis to create a unified national market for agricultural produce. After expansion, the portal will cover additional 415 mandis in the network.
